Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Book

  • public class Book
extends java.util.Observable
    Class representing the Books themselves within the EReader program.
    Author:
    Jack Guerin, Ali Hamza, Sultan Alnhari

      int getCurPage()
      This method returns the current page number of this book.
      float getProgress()
      This method returns the progress for the current book instance.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines()
      Returns the complete List of all words in the book.
      void nextPage()
      This method turns finds and grabs the next page of words in the current displayed book and updates the view with those string of words.
      void openBook()
      This method opens the current book to the either the first page in the book or whatever the current book marked page is.
      void prevPage()
      This method finds and grabs the previous page of words in the current displayed book and updates the view with those string of words.

      Reads in the book and stores its contents.
